title: Weekly Wrap: "They'll Be Fine."
description: It's Friday: NPR Political Reporter Ayesha Rascoe (@ayesharascoe) and Stephen Thompson (@idislikestephen) of NPR Music and Pop Culture Happy Hour tell Sam what he wants to know about the week's news. Helsinki. Amazon Prime Day. The Shiggy.  Get tickets for our live show in LA on July 30 with John Cho and Aneesh Chaganty at nprpresents.org.
